trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Espone <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> tipi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>rimane in memoria fino a quando l'oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>viene eliminato definitivamente.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and to calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La stessa istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>viene restituito dalle chiamate successive a questo metodo e alle chiamate a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo del peer è determinato di <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>callback virtuale.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> is created and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>non implementa il callback, non <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>viene creato e questo metodo restituisce `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> has not been created by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> non è stato creato per il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the element associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tasto di scelta rapida per l'elemento associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.String>stringa.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la chiave di accesso per il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The access key for this <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave di accesso per questo <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valore di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che identifica in modo univoco il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property, and if that isn't set, it's the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'identificatore di automazione è il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>, proprietà e se questa non è impostata, è il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the automation identifier.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente l'identificatore di automazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> representing the bounding rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che rappresenta il rettangolo di delimitazione il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio del <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.String>stringa.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile che utilizza il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the clickable point is any point that is within the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that would result in issuing the command that the button represents, when the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il punto selezionabile è qualsiasi punto all'interno dell'area client visibile del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>che verrebbero eseguendo il comando che rappresenta il pulsante, quando l'utente fa clic il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>utilizzando il mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: Il punto che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che descrive la funzionalità del <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned generally is the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: La stringa che viene restituita in genere è lo stesso testo fornito nella descrizione comando per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La stringa che descrive la funzionalità del <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that conveys the visual status of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che fornisce lo stato visivo del <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact could be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, lo stato di un contatto di messenger potrebbe essere "Occupato" o "Online".

trans-unit.source: A string containing the status.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente lo stato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the type of the item that the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa leggibile che contiene il tipo dell'elemento che la <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> rappresenta.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>

trans-unit.source: Examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Esempi sono "Documento", "Email" e "Contact".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the item type.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il tipo di elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> destinato al <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method could get the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>controllo, il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>metodo è stato possibile ottenere <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>per <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>cui è associata a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'elemento che è la destinazione di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'etichetta di testo di <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà nome può essere considerata come stringa di testo che si utilizzerebbe per spiegare il controllo viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: È importante disporre di una rappresentazione testuale per tutti i controlli di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] in modo che è possibile fare riferimento al controllo è a livello di codice in modo localizzato.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'etichetta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è disposto in una direzione specifica.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"> </xref> valore di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the interface if patternInterface is ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa il interfaccia se patternInterface è ; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> ha attualmente lo stato attivo di input dalla tastiera.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento ha lo stato attivo di input dalla tastiera; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è un elemento che contiene dati presentati all'utente.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is something that the end user would understand as being interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è un elemento che l'utente finale potrebbe considerare interattivo o come parte della struttura logica del controllo nel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this automation peer can receive and send events to the associated element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questo peer di automazione può ricevere e inviare eventi per l'elemento associato.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il peer di automazione può ricevere e inviare eventi; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> può accettare lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is off of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è visualizzato sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se l'elemento è visibile.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element can be on the screen but still not be visible, for example if the element is obscured by other elements.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, un elemento può essere sullo schermo ma non essere ancora visibile, ad esempio se l'elemento è nascosto da altri elementi.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method would return `false`.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso il metodo restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento non viene visualizzato sullo schermo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> include contenuto protetto.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is required to be filled out on a form.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> deve essere compilato in un form.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Imposta lo stato attivo di input nel <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>
